summary: This bill, the Advancing Innovation and Maintenance through Headquarters for Instruction, Growth, and High-tech training Act (AIM HIGH Act), directs the Secretary of the Air Force to establish and operate a Technical Training Center of Excellence. This center will facilitate collaboration among technical training installations, serve as a premier training location, and promote innovation in curriculum and training methodologies. The center will also engage with industry and academia. The Secretary of the Air Force will determine the Center's location.
